  * Lochnaghar 2 Initialization
  * SPI interface mode selected
  0x000000f0  0x00000003 SMbus_16inx_16dat  Write  0x44 * Single LN2 Write
  * POWER enable
  0x00000116  0x00000001 SMbus_16inx_16dat  Write  0x44 * Single LN2 Write

  * UART Configuration
   0x7A 0x0002 SMbus_16inx_16dat     Write  0x44      * GPIO_USB_UART_RX(7AH):   0002  USB_UART_RX_GPIO_SRC=0000_0010
   0xBA 0x0011 SMbus_16inx_16dat     Read   0x44      * GPIO_CHANNEL2(BAH):      0011  GPIO_CHANNEL2_STS=0, GPIO_CHANNEL2_SRC=0001_0001
   0x74 0x0000 SMbus_16inx_16dat     Write  0x44      * GPIO_DSP_UART1_RX(74H):  0000  DSP_UART1_RX_GPIO_SRC=0000_0000
   0x42 0x0001 SMbus_16inx_16dat     Write  0x44      * GPIO_DSP_GPIO4(42H):     0001  DSP_GPIO4_SRC=0000_0001

  * SPI routing enable
  0x000000ee  0x00000008 SMbus_16inx_16dat  Write  0x44 * Single LN2 Write

  * MCCLK1 CTRL
  0x0000001e  0x0000800a SMbus_16inx_16dat  Write  0x44 * Single LN2 Write
  * MCCLK2 CTRL
  0x0000001f  0x00008003 SMbus_16inx_16dat  Write  0x44 * Single LN2 Write
  * DSP_CLKIN CTRL: 24 MHZ
  0x20 0x800A SMbus_16inx_16dat     Write  0x44      * DSP_CLKIN_CTRL(20H):     800A  DSP_CLKIN_ENA=1, DSP_CLKIN_SRC=0000_1010

  * DSP AIF CTRL -> USB
  0x00000010  0x0000e00d SMbus_16inx_16dat  Write  0x44 * Single LN2 Write
  * USB AIF -> DSP AIF
  0x00000019  0x00009007 SMbus_16inx_16dat  Write  0x44 * Single LN2 Write
  * JTAG CONFIG
  0x000000ed  0x000008c0 SMbus_16inx_16dat  Write  0x44 * Single LN2 Write
